name: Leap (Sofia Santos)
description:
You are a frog! 

You are falling! 

It seems like you caught some unwanted attention on this adventure - 

beware of enemies, 

and rocks!

Certainly, not all is bad - you found some delicious prey yourself!

 - if you catch enough, you'll unveil the greatest gifts of all time!

[arrows = move // arrow up or space = jump // esc or p = pause]

Hope you enjoy this quick game that took inspiration from a cute little frog I found on the internet! 
The soundtrack turned out to be the best part of the game - - that is, if you're into 2000s european dance music!
